sourcesContent:
export default {
    colors:{
        primary:"#5636D3",
        secondary:"#FF872C",
        secondary_ligth:"rgba(255,135,44,0.3)",
        success:"#12A454",
        success_ligth:"rgb(18, 164, 84,0.5)",
        attention:"#E83F5B",
        attention_ligth:"rgb(232, 63, 91,0.5)",
        shape:"#FFFFFF",
        title:"#363F5F",
        text:"#969CB3",
        background:"#F0F2F5",
        text_dark:"#000000"
    },
    fonts:{
        regular:"Poppins_400Regular",
        medium:"Poppins_500Medium",
        bold:"Poppins_700Bold"
    }
}
